errors.error_description: The instructions show how to configure the authentication provider (Step 2) before telling the user to install the required packages (Step 3), which is an incorrect logical order.
correction_candidates: Combine the installation and configuration steps into a single step.
Move the 'Install the required packages' step to be before the 'Configure an Authentication Provider Object' step.
Move the 'Register your application' step to be last.
Add a note at the beginning of the 'Getting started' section to install all packages first.
errors.golden_answer: Move the 'Install the required packages' step to be before the 'Configure an Authentication Provider Object' step.
